column5: Going to Pashkokogan for a week at late July/early August. Has anyone fished this lake that wouldn't mind giving a few tips/pointers? And are there topo maps of the lake anywhere? Thanks in advance for the help.

I got your e-mail but it won't allow me to respond through Walley Central. Send me another message with your direct e-mail address and I'll be able to help you out. I just returned from there Saturday and we had another great trip.
